Name: Life Matters - Act I
About the game: This game is about you the player living another life. As you meet many people with your best friend Jordan and a girl named Delilah. You work a dead-end job You will have many misadventures with other people and storylines that may end one way or another depending on your choices. Life matter is a Adult Visual Novel that will have many endings to the game with you choice what women to pursue who to friendzone. There will be many choices in the game some may have an immediate effect some may not effect at all or some may affect later, but everything matters in the end. What will you do with your story make it drama filled event with many woman or just chill a time with your best friend and many more to come The games Expected playtime through one playthrough is at least 7 hours as you get so all choices you will make in this drama filled event packed with all kinds of things because Life always Matters.
